name: The story of Ebbe
description:
This is an mini rpg about a man called Ebbe. 

Ebbe is a peaceful man that has put away his weapons to seek out a more calm life on his farm. But one day the mayor from the nearby village comes running to ask for help.

This is a school project and the second game i ever made. So please download and try it and if you have time please give me feedback :)
